name: Rajiv Patel
learned: Rajiv Patelis one of the players that is hiding with the other seven players in the hide-and-seek game in Smallville. He loves to play with other people and explore new ideas of where to hide.
currently: Rajiv Patel is hiding from Klaus Mueller and Wolfgang Schultz. He moves around Smallville hiding spot to hiding spot and hiding there everyday.
lifestyle: Rajiv Patel plays hide and seek all day. He likes to hide alone and/or with others if they are not caught by the seeker, Klaus Mueller or Wolfgang Schultz.
living_area: the Ville:artist's co-living space:Rajiv Patel's room
